publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7709 Aileen Campbell: UNICEF Rights Respecting School Award for Carnwath Primary Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Carnwath Primary School on gaining a Rights Respecting School Award from UNICEF UK; notes that the school received the award in recognition of its successful completion of several tasks, including strengthening its links with Engaruka Chini Primary School in Tanzania, and considers as excellent the work of the Rights Respecting Schools awards programme, which encourages schools to place the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child at the heart of their ethos and curriculum. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*
S3M-7709 UNICEF Rights Respecting School Award for Carnwath Primary School (lodged on 14 January 2011) Gil Paterson*
S3M-7709 UNICEF Rights Respecting School Award for Carnwath Primary School (lodged on 14 January 2011) Maureen Watt*, Jamie Hepburn*, Linda Fabiani*
